trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Scottsdale

divs: Sighting Details was standing on back patio smoking a cigarette.saw a light in the clouds of to the west thought at first it was a plane comingthrough the clouds, but it was moving to fast and in sporatic directions. wentin the house and got 2 friends to come back out side and make sure i was seeingwhat i was seeing. when we returned outside you could see more than a dozen ofthese lights darting back and forth across the sky. it is now 12:58am and myfriends are still outside watching this. so it has been going on now for over45min.after the initial sighting we had know idea what to do or who to call so igot on line and you were the first web sight that came up.
